actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress regarding the awarding of concessions at units of the National Park System.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Secretary of the Interior should not award concessions at units of the National Park System to foreign-owned companies.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress regarding the awarding of concessions at units of the National Park System.
